content:
Answers must be short and succinct

You have access to the following tools:
1. pokeapi_get_pokemon
   Description: Fetch a summarized view of a Pokémon by name or ID from PokeAPI. Returns id, name, height, weight, types, and sprite URLs.
   Parameters: ToolSchema(properties=null, required=null)
2. pokeapi_get_move
   Description: Fetch basic information about a Pokémon move by name or ID from PokeAPI. Returns id, name, power, PP, accuracy, type, and damage class.
   Parameters: ToolSchema(properties=null, required=null)
3. pokeapi_search_pokemon
   Description: List Pokémon names using the paginated list endpoint from PokeAPI. Supports limit (1-100, default 20) and offset (default 0) parameters.
   Parameters: ToolSchema(properties=null, required=null)

To use a tool, respond with a JSON object in this format:
{"tool": "tool_name", "arguments": {"param1": "value1", "param2": "value2"}}

You can request multiple tools by using an array:
[{"tool": "tool1", "arguments": {...}}, {"tool": "tool2", "arguments": {...}}]

After tool execution, you will receive the results and should provide your final answer.

Tool execution results:
Tool: pokeapi_search_pokemon
Arguments: {"limit":20,"offset":0}
Result: TextContent(text=Found 1350 Pokémon total
Showing 20 results (offset: 0, limit: 20)
Next page available
